name: DavBot
storyline:
The MOP COMPANY Founded by Dr. Simon AI Mopsky Has Showcased their newest Prototype of the smartest robot in the world Code Named "DavBot" But on the showcase stage
something unexpected happened, Before the show the floors were mopped like usual but this time the water from the bucket got leaked and davbot got wet the water damaged almost the entire AI Program of his
So they scrapped him. DAVBOT was send to Work in The Prison. But during the Errors of his AI. DAVBOT Felt Something other than Pain. He Felt the Dreams of being free. The Dreams Stayed with him this whole time and He choosen that it was time to make then come true.
He Started Running. The Security Tried to Stop Him But he runned and runned. Dr. Mopsky was in the prison at the time of first escape. DavBot was Stopped. Now He Felt Sadness, he didnt wanted to work anymore. Because of that he was Being Hurt a lot by the guards. but davbot remember the dreams.
And the Dreams remember him. Now Few Years Later DAVBOT is Ready for a Second Try at Escaping The Paragon City & The M.O.P Company Wont Stop Him This Time!
summary: DavBot will be a 9 Chaptered 2D Platformer. Kill Enemies. Grab Coins. Break out from Paragon City
